medical_explanations.azithromycin: the drug is called "spiramycin." Azithromycin has been found effective in treating many infectious diseases and it may be useful as an anti-inflammatory agent for patients with rheumatoid arthritis (RA) or osteoarthritis (OA) who have high levels of interleukin 6 (IL-6).
medical_explanations.carvedilol: it can be said that the treatment of hypertension and angina pectoris are two different areas in cardiology with only one drug having both properties: beta-blocker therapy for heart failure (HF) or calcium channel blockers (CCBs) for coronary artery disease.
